        * Corner pieces solve exactly like megaminx corners

    * 3.2.6 Fat Dino Cube / Rex Cube - SOLVED
      * Solution
        * http://twistypuzzles.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=190533#p190533
	* Solve edges first like dino cube
	* Solve centers to validate parity.  3-swap algorithm: [{UFL}, {UBR}]
	* If parity is wrong (2 centers unsolved), swap 2 edges on 1 face and resolve edges.  Centers will be messed up so don't need to be solved.
	* Solve wedges using above algorithm and setup moves.  First 3 faces are intuitive (solve 3 adjacent faces first).  Last 3 require matching a center with a wrong wedge across from a correct wedge in such a way that they can be flipped back in the opposite order.  For example, to swap the UBL wedge and the FUR wedge the algo is ({UFR}, [{UBR}, {DBL}'] ({DBL}, [{UFL}, {UBR}']) ({UFL}', [{DBL}', {DFR}']))
      * Solves
        * 2010/11/12 00:12:23 238
    * 3.2.7 Lattice Cube - SOLVED
      * Solution
        * Solve centers first.  Adjacent centers (across 2 faces) are attached.
        * Solve corners.  3-swap algorithm: [l, F]
      * Solves
        * 2010/03/24 00:05:16 95
        * 2010/03/24 00:03:25 71

    * 5.2.1 - SOLVED
      * Solution
        * Solve edges.
        * Solve corners using (D, F)-type moves
        * Solve centers using (D, F) L (D, F)
        * Optionally solve centers second, and solve corners using ((D, F), L)
        * http://twistypuzzles.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=77110#p77110
        * http://twistypuzzles.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=86051#p86051
        * http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KWyhSAFPpUU

    * 5.2.2
      * Solution
        * http://twistypuzzles.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=82597#p82597
        * http://twistypuzzles.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=113588#p113588
    * 5.2.3 - SOLVED
      * Solution
        * Solve edges first (just rotate so they match).
        * Solve trapezoids next - (D,R), etc. Easy.
        * Solve corners next - 3 cycle: ((F,L),D)
        * Solve centers last - 2 2 cycles (FRL)*?
      * Solves
        * 2010/03/29 00:01:40 50
